title.narrative: Second Phase of the APL on Strengthening Regional Cooperation for Wildlife Protection in Asia

description.narrative: To assist the participating governments of Bhutan and others to build or enhance shared capacity, institutions, knowledge and incentives to collaborate in tackling illegal wildlife trade and other selected regional conservation threats to habitats in border areas.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Finance, Royal Government of Bhutan
Wildlife Conservation Division, Department of Forests and Park Services

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I. A, Paragraph 1 | Description :Establishment of Project Implementation Steering Committee| Due Date :15-Jul-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I. C, Paragraph 1 (b) (i) | Description :Prior to commencement of any works under theproject, the Borrower must implement applicable RAP or IPDP in a manner satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I. C, Paragraph 1 (b) (ii) | Description :If any modification or finalization of anyactivity design or implementation gives rise to Displaced persons, Borrower shall implement a RAP and/or IPDP satisfactory to theAssociation | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I. C, Paragraph 1 | Description :Application of Environmental and Social ManagementFramework (ESMF) | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I. C, Paragraph 2 and 3 | Description :Monitor implementation of ESMF, EMPs, RAPs, RPF, SIA& IPDS & submission of semi-annual M&E reports. Obtain prior concurrence for any modification/waiver of safeguard instruments. |Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section IV. B, Paragraph 1 | Description :For Category 2 of FA's eligible expenditure table:preparation and adoption of the Operational Manual in form and substance satisfactory to the Association (Condition ofdisbursement) | Due Date :30-Dec-2011
